5.text: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

6.text: The sons of Gomer: Ashkenaz, and Diphath, and Togarmah.

7.text: The sons of Javan: Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Rodanim.

8.text: The sons of Ham: Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.

9.text: The sons of Cush: Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raama, and Sabteca. The sons of Raamah: Sheba, and Dedan.

10.text: Cush became the father of Nimrod; he began to be a mighty one in the earth.

11.text: Mizraim became the father of Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

12.text: and Pathrusim, and Casluhim (where the Philistines came from), and Caphtorim.

13.text: Canaan became the father of Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,

14.text: and the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,

15.text: and the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

16.text: and the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.

17.text: The sons of Shem: Elam, and Asshur, and Arpachshad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.

18.text: Arpachshad became the father of Shelah, and Shelah became the father of Eber.

19.text: To Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; for in his days the earth was divided; and his brother’s name was Joktan.

20.text: Joktan became the father of Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

21.text: and Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

22.text: and Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

23.text: and Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.

28.text: The sons of Abraham: Isaac, and Ishmael.

29.text: These are their generations: the firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,

30.text: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,

31.text: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.

32.text: The sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she bore Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. The sons of Jokshan: Sheba, and Dedan.

33.text: The sons of Midian: Ephah, and Epher, and Hanoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these were the sons of Keturah.

34.text: Abraham became the father of Isaac. The sons of Isaac: Esau, and Israel.

35.text: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jalam, and Korah.

36.text: The sons of Eliphaz: Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.

37.text: The sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

38.text: The sons of Seir: Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.

39.text: The sons of Lotan: Hori, and Homam; and Timna was Lotan’s sister.

40.text: The sons of Shobal: Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. The sons of Zibeon: Aiah, and Anah.

41.text: The sons of Anah: Dishon. The sons of Dishon: Hamran, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.

42.text: The sons of Ezer: Bilhan, and Zaavan, Jaakan. The sons of Dishan: Uz, and Aran.

43.text: Now these are the kings who reigned in the land of Edom, before there reigned any king over the children of Israel: Bela the son of Beor; and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

44.text: Bela died, and Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his place.

45.text: Jobab died, and Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his place.

46.text: Husham died, and Hadad the son of Bedad, who struck Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his place; and the name of his city was Avith.

47.text: Hadad died, and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his place.

48.text: Samlah died, and Shaul of Rehoboth by the River reigned in his place.

49.text: Shaul died, and Baal Hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his place.

50.text: Baal Hanan died, and Hadad reigned in his place; and the name of his city was Pai: and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.

51.text: Hadad died. The chiefs of Edom were: chief Timna, chief Aliah, chief Jetheth,

52.text: chief Oholibamah, chief Elah, chief Pinon,

53.text: chief Kenaz, chief Teman, chief Mibzar,

54.text: chief Magdiel, chief Iram. These are the chiefs of Edom.
